name: text-summarizer
description: Text summarization and keyword extraction tool with Vue.js frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:up
